# ui-expansion-folder

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Usage

### Ui-expansion-folder-usage

# How to use `ui-expansion-folder`

```html
<ui-expansion-folder>
  <ui-expansion-panel expanded>
    <div slot="header">UI Expansion Panel Header</div>
    <div slot="content">
      Incidunt enim voluptatem ab officiis et dolorem officia ea. Officia necessitatibus molestiae
      beatae et iste sed. Dolore sint in consequatur similique eos est. Magnam in amet suscipit ea
      eaque sed quidem. Autem corporis libero quasi recusandae omnis.
    </div>
  </ui-expansion-panel>
  <ui-expansion-panel>
    <div slot="header">UI Expansion Panel Header</div>
    <div slot="content">
      Incidunt enim voluptatem ab officiis et dolorem officia ea. Officia necessitatibus molestiae
      beatae et iste sed. Dolore sint in consequatur similique eos est. Magnam in amet suscipit ea
      eaque sed quidem. Autem corporis libero quasi recusandae omnis.
    </div>
  </ui-expansion-panel>
  <!-- ... -->
</ui-expansion-folder>
```

## CSS Custom Properties

| Name                                  | Description                            |
| ------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------- |
| `--UI-Expansion-Folder-Display`       | Display of the expansion panel.        |
| `--UI-Expansion-Folder-FlexDirection` | Flex direction of the expansion panel. |
| `--UI-Expansion-Folder-Gap`           | Gap between the expansion panel items. |
